North Union Farmers Market - Cleveland Clinic Main Campus
Description: The Cleveland Clinic Main Campus Market has become a vibrant community gathering place filled with local farmers and artisan food producers. Health screenings and live music make this an educational and fun destination. Located at Crile Mall (across the street from the Crile Building at 2049 E. 100th Street between Carnegie Avenue and Euclid Avenue). You will find farms and food producers with fresh produce, meats, dairy, baked goods and more.

Name: North Union Farmers Market - University Hospitals
Description: Introducing our market at University Hospitals Cleveland Medical Center at Lakeside! Locally sourced lunch is served while you shop at this world-class medical and educational facility, Free parking 30 steps from farm-fresh produce!

Name: North Union Farmers Market - Crocker Park Indoor Winter Market
Description: Support your local farms year-round at Crocker Park’s Winter Farmers Market! Items to look forward to include antibiotic and hormone-free beef, pork, poultry and dairy products, organic maple syrup, honey, farm-fresh eggs, cheeses, winter greens, herbs, apples, potatoes, lettuces, organic grains, specialty goods, and root vegetables. Free parking is available and within close proximity to the market.  We look forward to seeing you soon!

Name: North Union Farmers Market - Van Aken District Indoor Winter Market
Description: Join us in The Van Aken District in the Van Aken Market Hall at the Indoor Winter Farmers Market and enjoy the magnificence of Ohio produce and products. Items to look forward to, including antibiotic and hormone free beef, pork, poultry and dairy products, organic maple syrup, honey, farm-fresh eggs, cheeses, winter greens, herb, apples, potatoes, lettuces, organic grains, specialty goods and root vegetables. Over 20 farms, bakers and artists will participate at the market.

Name: North Union Farmers Market - Crocker Park

Name: Bauman Orchards Farm Market
Description: Bauman Orchards, started in 1929, currently has a total of 260 acres with 70,000 apple trees and 12,000 peach trees. Now in our fourth generation, we also raise pears, plums, sweet corn, strawberries and blueberries. Our retail farm market in Rittman, Ohio is open year round. We offer seasonal fruit, homemade pies, cookies, and gift baskets. We have two other seasonal farm market locations: Scenic Ridge Fruit Farm in Jeromesville and our Corner Market, also in Rittman.
Address: 161 Rittman Ave, Rittman, OH 44270-1253, United States

Name: Bauman Orchards Scenic Ridge Fruit Farm
Description: Scenic Ridge Fruit Farm is an extension of Bauman Orchards, offering homegrown peaches July – September, and fresh pressed cider in September and October. Seasonally available products include apples, farm fresh eggs, apple butter, jams, nuts and candies, local honey, maple syrup, sweet corn, melons, tomatoes, green beans, plums, raspberries, pumpkins, squash, gourds.
Address: 2031 State Route 89, Jeromesville, OH 44840-9654, United States

Address: 10370 Akron Rd, Rittman, OH 44270-9787, United States

Name: Beckwith Orchards
Description: Family owned and operated orchard since 1878. Our season begins in late July with peaches, nectarines and corn. The selection changes with the seasons. Fall brings apples, pumpkins, gourds and cider. There is also an on-site gift shop and bakery.
Address: 1617 Lake Rockwell Rd, Kent, OH 44240-3019, United States

Name: Hillcrest Orchard
Description: Hillcrest Orchard of Walnut Creek is family-owned and operated by the Merle Hershberger family. There are 75 acres of orchard on which 22 varieties of apples and 12 varieties of peach are grown. Our apples and freshly pressed cider are sold at our store, which is open seasonally from August through March.  We also carry local meats and cheeses, a full line of fresh produce, nuts, candies, and snacks.
Address: 2474 Walnut St, Sugarcreek, OH 44681-9419, United States

Name: Hollmeyer's Orchards
Description: We are a family-owned 105 year-old orchard on the west side of Cincinnati. Our on-farm market sells everything we grow when in season; peaches, plums, pears, apples, and an array of vegetables. We make our own pickles and unpasteurized cider.
Address: 3241 Fiddlers Green Rd, Cincinnati, OH 45248-2805, United States

Name: Malone Orchards Market
Description: Malone Orchards is a family owned and operated farm located in Berlin Heights, Ohio.  We grow a variety of apples including HoneyCrisp and EverCrisp, as well as pears, plums, cherries, pumpkins, gourds, and squash.  We also grow field crops of soybeans and corn.  We operate a seasonal market in Berlin Heights, it is open from September until December (depending on the crop year).
Address: 9518 State Route 61, Berlin Heights, OH 44814-9660, United States

Name: Manfull Orchards Farm Market

Name: Miller Orchards

At Miller Orchards, we value the integrity that has been passed down through the generations and we provide quality produce at an honest price in a family atmosphere. From simple beginnings in the 1800’s, to the first Miller Orchards retail operation in the early 1960s, the family tradition is carried on today by David and Roger Miller and their families.

Name: Burnham Orchards
Description: Burnham Orchards, is a family owned and operated farm, providing great tasting fruits along with a fun experience that includes activities for people of all ages. From pick your own pumpkins to orchard hayrides, we provide a taste of the farm that you just can't get any where else!

Name: Celeste Orchards
Description: Orchard with local fruit available seasonally. Must call ahead for availability.

Name: Cold Springs Orchard
Description: Here at Cold Springs, we take great pride in our history and believe in the importance of family and community. We believe in taking care of the land we have been blessed with and in turn it yields delicious and beautiful fruit. Stop by and try a fresh apple—eating locally grown is always in season.
Address: 878 Windsor Mechanicsville Rd, Rock Creek, OH 44084-9638, United States

Name: Hillside Orchard and Farm Market
Description: Family owned orchard and farm market offering a variety of fruits and locally sourced produce.

Name: Quarry Hill Orchards and Winery
Description: Our passion is growing fruit. Apples are our primary crop, but that’s not all we grow on our 400-acre farm. Anything that grows on a tree is fair game for us, including peaches, cherries, plums, pears, apricots, nectarines, and grapes; the latter which supply our winemaker next door at Quarry Hill Winery. Please check our Harvest Calendar for specific ripening dates. We also have a nice selection of fresh cider, local produce, and artisan goods as part of our other offerings.
Address: 8403 Mason Rd, Berlin Heights, OH 44814-9300, United States

Name: Country Maid Ice Cream & Orchard
Description: Country Maid Orchard includes over 2,000 apple, peach, pear, and plum trees, along with some vegetables, blueberry bushes, and raspberry bushes. All of the ice cream, sherbet, and yogurt that you enjoy at Country Maid Ice Cream is made right here at our only location, where premium ice cream has been made since 1948.
Address: 3252 W Streetsboro Rd, Richfield, OH 44286-9120, United States

Name: Apple Country Farm Market
Description: Apple Country Farm Market (ACFM) is a family owned and operated business. As an authorized dealer for Weaver Barns and LuxCraft Poly Furniture, we offer quality sheds, buildings, and outdoor furniture year round! Our Farm Market is open seasonally based on our apple harvest (usually early September - the end of October). In addition to the large variety of apples, we also produce fresh cider and seasonal honey varieties. The Country Store in the market carries additional local pantry staples.

Name: Apple Hill Orchard - Mansfield Market
Description: Apple Hill Or.chards has two locations. The Mansfield location is a hub of retail sales and family-friendly activities. Here, you’ll find our cider press, fruit-themed bakery, observation beehive, rich variety of apples and vegetables, boutique gifts, and unique decorative items.
